examples: She's inundated with work at the moment.
We have been inundated with offers of help.
The fields were inundated with the heavy rain.
The researchers were inundated with a welter of information.
After the broadcast, we were inundated with requests for more information.
example_translate: В данный момент она завалена работой.
После эфира нас завалили просьбами о получении более подробной информации.
